mapper.select: SELECT LA.SEASONCODE, S.TYPE, S.NO, S.NAME, S.POINT, GRADETOALPHABET(G.TOTAL) AS ALPHABET, GRADETOPOINT(G.TOTAL) AS TOTAL, E.EVALSTATE FROM LECTUREAPPLY LA, SUBJECT S, GRADE G, LECTUREEVAL E WHERE LA.SBJNO = S.NO AND LA.SBJNO = G.SBJNO AND LA.SBJNO = E.SBJNO AND LA.STNO = ${stNo} AND LA.SEASONCODE = ${seasonCode}

SELECT PS.CODENAME AS SEASONCODE, PT.CODENAME AS TYPENAME, S.TYPE, S.NO, S.NAME, S.POINT, GRADETOALPHABET(G.TOTAL) AS ALPHABET, GRADETOPOINT(G.TOTAL) AS TOTAL FROM GRADE G, SUBJECT S, PUBLICCODE PS, PUBLICCODE PT WHERE G.SBJNO = S.NO AND S.SEASONCODE = PS.NO AND S.TYPE = PT.NO AND STNO = ${stNo} ORDER BY SBJNO

SELECT PS.CODENAME AS SEASONCODE, PT.CODENAME AS TYPENAME, S.TYPE, S.NO, S.NAME, S.POINT, GRADETOALPHABET(G.TOTAL) AS ALPHABET, GRADETOPOINT(G.TOTAL) AS TOTAL FROM GRADE G, SUBJECT S, PUBLICCODE PS, PUBLICCODE PT WHERE G.SBJNO = S.NO AND S.SEASONCODE = PS.NO AND S.TYPE = PT.NO AND STNO = ${stNo} AND S.SEASONCODE = ${seasonCode} ORDER BY SBJNO
SELECT S.SEASONCODE, SUM(S.POINT) AS SUM, AVG(GRADETOPOINT(G.TOTAL)) AS AVG FROM GRADE G, SUBJECT S WHERE G.SBJNO = S.NO AND STNO = ${stNo} GROUP BY S.SEASONCODE ORDER BY S.SEASONCODE ASC
